name: The arcane leggings of Rulership
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
